name: Hayek Testnet
introduction: exSat is a Layer 1.5 scaling solution designed to unlock the full potential of the Bitcoin ecosystem.Hayek is the testnet of exSat. the BTC data on it comes from the BTC test3 testnet.

name: Everstake
introduction: Everstake is a responsible validator trusted by more than 735k users across 80 various blockchain networks.

name: Antpool
introduction: The world's leading cryptocurrency mining platform.

name: SpiderPool
introduction: SpiderPool, founded in 2018, is a self-developed integrated mining pool with stable operation and solid technology. We are proven to have accumulated rich experience in ETH and BTC mining pool operation, in-depth technological research, strong development and a technical team with more than 11 years of industry experience. After more than six years of accumulated efforts, SpiderPool's ETH (POW) mining pool was ranked 3rd in the world and SpiderPool's current main business BTC mining pool is also among the top in the whole network.

name: F2Pool
introduction: f2pool is the world’s leading Bitcoin and crypto mining pool since 2013.

name: BigONE
introduction: BigONE is a pioneering cryptocurrency exchange with a long-standing reputation for excellence. The platform serves as an all-in-one solution for digital assets, offering powerful and user-friendly features such as trading, staking, and financial services. With millions of users globally, BigONE is committed to making cryptocurrency accessible worldwide. The exchange has been a key player in the blockchain revolution, notably as a top block producer in the EOS ecosystem. BigONE is dedicated to leading the future of digital finance by providing a secure, seamless, and comprehensive user experience.

name: miPool
introduction: miPool is a professional cryptocurrency mining team that was established in 2016 and has been mining major cryptocurrencies and developing blockchain infrastructure technology, mainly in Asia. We have accumulated a lot of experience and know-how in Bitcoin POW and ETH POW mining, POS staking such as EOS DPoS and Polkadot NPoS, and Filecoin (WindowPoS) mining.

name: Treis Blockchain
introduction: Founded in 2017 and headquartered in Greenville, South Carolina, USA, Treis Blockchain is a blockchain service provider specializing in the operations and management of immersion and hydro cooled mining operations. They also manage 100s of proof of stake validation nodes and provide consulting/development services for Web3 integrated solutions.

name: ChainUp Cloud
introduction: ChainUp Cloud is an all-in-one Web3 platform that provides a range of services, including API services for developers, DeFi products for users, and node services for everyone.

name: Certik
introduction: CertiK is the world's leading smart contract auditor. We provide full-cycle security solutions for enterprises, including auditing, security rating,Compliance&AML,investment and other security-related services, elevating the entire Web3 journey of our clients.

name: InfStones
introduction: InfStones is committed to supporting a wide range of AVSes and reward delegators through our Giveaway!

name: InfStones
introduction: InfStones is committed to supporting a wide range of Blockchain, AVS services, and reward delegators.

name: myCactus
introduction: Leading Qualified Custodian for Digital Assets.

name: muiden
introduction: Instalación y Hosting de Data Center: En MUIDEN, ofrecemos soluciones completas en el ámbito de data centers. En cuanto a la instalación, diseñamos su centro de datos, proporcionamos servidores y materiales de calidad, y contamos con mano de obra altamente especializada para su implementación. En cuanto al hosting, ofrecemos servicios de custodia, mantenimiento y reparación especializada para garantizar el funcionamiento óptimo y la seguridad de su data center. Con MUIDEN, su infraestructura de TI está en manos confiables y expertas.

name: C² Ventures
introduction: C² Ventures takes a chain-agnostic approach, making early-stage investments across all major layer 1 and layer 2 ecosystems.We focus on empowering builders with the capital and operational expertise to build and scale the next generation of Web3 and Metaverse applications.

name: Greymass
introduction: We're Greymass, an imaginative team of developers and researchers who are paving the way to a better decentralized internet.

name: Pythagoras Investments
introduction: At Pythagoras, we are quantitative traders of cryptocurrencies.

name: Bing Ventures

name: Matrixport
introduction: Matrixport is the world’s leading, and Asia’s largest all-in-one hub for crypto financial services, with the commission to building an entry-grade ecosystem for the crypto space, by providing every user with a personalized super account that integrates features including crypto assets trading, investment, loan, custody, RWA, and research.
